subject: Add comprehensive manual testing guide
body:
Create detailed manual testing documentation covering:
- Quick sanity check (10 min)
- Mode 1: Pricing Calculator (5 models)
- Mode 2: Transaction Structuring (6 models, 47 variants)
- Options Overview and Structure Selector testing
- Model-by-model test cases with expected values
- Perspective toggle and Compare Mode testing
- Sensitivity analysis and Growth projections
- Compliance Analyzer and TP risk testing
- Export/Import functionality
- Edge cases and error handling
- Cross-browser and mobile testing checklist

Includes test data reference values and issue reporting template.
